properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
